name: filemate - devcontainer
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'echo ==== MOUNT CHECK ==== && echo /workspaces && ls -al /workspaces || true && echo /workspaces/filemate && ls -al /workspaces/filemate || true && echo /workspaces/filemate/frontend && ls -al /workspaces/filemate/frontend || true && echo ==== NPM SETUP ==== && mkdir -p /home/node/.npm && chown -R node:node /workspaces/filemate /home/node/.npm || true && su node -c "cd /workspaces/filemate/frontend && npm install && npx cypress verify" || true'
